page.title: 15New Forge for Old
page.content: Tim Fortune runs a forge beside the pretty Filleybrook.There has been a forge on this site for 200 years but the large sign'Blacksmith and Ironwork Designer'gives an idea of the changes made in the last two years.The old forge,handoperated bellows and drills are being carefully restored.Alongside are the new forge and electrically operated fan,powerdrill and lathe. Hammers and tongs of every shape and size are neatly arranged within easy reach of forge and anvil.The old paint shop is now a showroom with metal sculptures displayed against white painted walls.These and the many finished pieces of fireplace furniture show the skill of the craftsman,while the books of original designs show what can be acheived to order.
